document_data.name: Chervil
document_data.mainbody: '''Chervil''' was a species of plant found in [[Faer√ªn]] that was commonly used as a [[herb]].
document_data.Availability: * [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']] sold chervil at a price of five [[copper piece]]s per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}} in its "Aurora's Larder" section.
document_data.Notable Users: * [[The Painted Boat]], a restaurant in the [[Dragon Reach]] off the southern edge of the [[Ravens Bluff/Harbor District|Harbor District]] of [[Ravens Bluff]], commonly kept chervil stocked in the kitchen's drying rack.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/79/The Living City: The Painted Boat Restaurant|15}}
